@HomeAndDesignIE Yep. Cranberry sauce. 900ml of chicken stock, about half a bottle of red & 2 jars of cranberry sauce. I freeze left over 4 later, reduce it down to put over duck or reduce to really sticky & pour over ribs in the oven.
Now into the oven for about 3 hours. Slow cooked lamb shanks in a red wine & cranberry sauce. https://t.co/Sl7rY0SJj3
